text:
After #vaccinenationalism and #vaccineregionalism (hello #EU!), we now need a new term for #vaccinestateism, as Bavaria (1/16 German federal states) goes gung-ho and pre-orders #Covid19 #vaccine.
 
And as Thorsten clearly points out, please view this as #election politics too... https://t.co/xEMJPfmYYu
